short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-based web-extension - helps autistic individuals detect emotions in photos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-powered Chrome extension for facial emotions recognition: identifies 50+ visible emotions.

Curious about the potential feelings shared in photos and videos? Let our tool decode them for you in an instant!

Features:
üîç Emotion Detection: Detects over 50 distinct emotions from faces, providing insight into the feelings not spoken aloud.
üé≠ Detailed Emotional Breakdowns: Analyzes facial expressions in depth, from the faintest hints to the most evident emotions.
‚ú® Flexible Use: Functions smoothly on platforms like Google Meet, and during photo browsing or video viewing on YouTube and beyond.
üåç Multilingual Support: Available in English, Espa√±ol, Fran√ßais, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, Portugu√™s, Italiana, and Êó•Êú¨Ë™û, embracing users from all corners of the world.

How to Use the Emotions Detector for Chrome

Open Content: Find an image or video with faces for analysis.
Activate Extension: Click on the "Emotions Detector" icon in your browser's toolbar.
Select and Analyze: Press the "Select" button in the extension, pick a face, and view the emotions identified right away.

Note for usage:

The extension is explicitly intended for private use within domestic settings. Users must get permission from people before analyzing their emotions with this extension. Images are not stored on Autentik AI servers, and the computer vision is powered by the Hume API. Designed for users in the UK and USA. While using during a call, ask other persons for a permission.
